Reviews.Content: queensway tried book bloomsbury time prices forced move else ramada hyde park location excellent walking distance notting hill bus stops oxford street tottenham court road buses camden victoria close notting hill gate queensway bayswater tube stations queensway lot restaurants pubs shops standard double size extremely clean nice views victorian houses hotel brightest hotel enormous window 4 walls actually double bed comfortable mirror decent size flat screen sum stay
